input-field.name: title
input-field.label: Main Shipping Carrier Title
input-field.help-text: Name of the main shipping carrier, also used for carrier title if no rates can be found. This is updated dynamically from ShipperHQ

input-field.name: apiKey
input-field.label: API Key
input-field.help-text: Obtain from under Websites in the ShipperHQ Dashboard

input-field.name: authenticationCode
input-field.label: Authentication Code
input-field.help-text: Obtain from under Websites in the ShipperHQ Dashboard

input-field.name: hideNotify
input-field.label: Hide Carrier Notifications
input-field.help-text: Carriers may include notifications when their live rates have been modified

input-field.name: ignoreEmptyZip
input-field.label: Require Meaningful Address To Request Rates
input-field.help-text: Only request shipping rates from ShipperHQ if all of the required address fields in checkout are populated. This helps to lower the number of API requests

input-field.name: developerMode
input-field.label: Developer Mode
input-field.help-text: Please leave Unchecked, used for ShipperHQ Developer testing

input-field.name: debug
input-field.label: Enable Debug Log
input-field.help-text: Log ShipperHQ shipping rate requests and debug information
